title: Every single time I watch oce LCS commentators say something so fking stupid
body:
"Vi not known for her skirmishing pre-6"

Vi is one of the strongest dueling/skirmishing junglers and always has been since release, knockback dash, two AA reset's, armour shred and AS, where did you find this commentator?

Oh yea I remember the other thing this commentator said, "Jax counters rumble"

Btw it's this that Indian looking commentator that says "overtuned" every second sentence.

replies.body: the one on the left is a monkey which sniff petrol

"Vi not known for her skirmishing pre-6" doesnt mean she cant fight pre-6, the matter is that MOST lcs junglers who play vi stick to counter ganking pre 6 and rush that lvl 6 for the E Z 99% certain kill using that full lockdown. (FYI i agree with you, i love VI and think she is powerful pre 6)

The thing about opinions is they are just that, opinions, and unless he is attempting some bull%%%% statistic, there's arguments for and against nearly every opinion. 

so chill out man

that or apply for his job and show us how it is done

Vi is known for early ganking, and huge damage, which is exactly what that vi did, what kind of sht vi farms till 6 like their fking yi. No jungler sits there farming till 6 in pro scene, if they did they'd lose every game. if anything in pro scene ganks are more common as they are far more easy to coordinate. I HIGHLY doubt he gets payed, I mean I pray he doesn't, but yea, I could do a far better job.

i actually find his commentary quite nice.

at least he isn't yelling at the top of his voice every time someone drops a ward.

TO THE OP
Step out for behind the smurf you little coward, got something to say then grow a set and use your main..

did u just call me a coward for not using my main LOL, it's fking perma'd junior.

Btw you're bronze 2, you'd have no fking clue whats going on anyways.
oh its permabanned.. shows what sort of person you are big boy.
